qpriLargeAggregator.mainSelect: select b.cd_punto, --0 b.cd_punto, --1 c.operando, --2 to_char(b.d_inizio_val, 'yyyymmdd'), --3 case when to_char(b.d_fine_val, 'yyyymmdd') is null then data_fine_val(b.cd_punto,c.operando,v.ctar1,b.d_inizio_val, b.d_fine_val) else to_char(b.d_fine_val, 'yyyymmdd') end case, case when c.tipo_tariffa is null then parametri_large (b.cd_parametro_valore_large,B.CD_PUNTO,b.d_inizio_val)else c.tipo_tariffa end case, --5 b.n_valore,--6 d.id_operando, --7 d.tipo--8 from DBI_USER.rpl_anu_t_param_valori_large b, z_parametro_operando_large c, z_anagrafica_operandi d, z_test_contratti e, dbi_user.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v where b.cd_parametro_valore_large = c.cd_parametro and b.cd_punto=e.cncon and c.operando =d.operando and v.ctar1=c.ctar1 and b.cd_punto=v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and e.cncon=v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and v.ctar1 ='STD_GDS1' and d.tipo='QPRICE' and v.cfreq=c.tipo and e.note = 'lotto 21' --and v.ccontratto=b.cd_contratto group by b.cd_punto, --0 b.cd_punto, --1 c.operando, --2 to_char(b.d_inizio_val, 'yyyymmdd'), --3 to_char(b.d_fine_val, 'yyyymmdd'), b.cd_punto,c.OPERANDO,v.ctar1,b.d_inizio_val,b.d_fine_val ,--4 b.cd_parametro_valore_large,B.CD_PUNTO, c.tipo_tariffa , --5, b.n_valore,--6 d.id_operando, --8 d.tipo order by b.cd_punto

FactQpriLargeExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT PFACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 PFACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 PFACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 PFACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 Pfacts_f_qprice.legacy, --4 Pfacts_f_qprice.tipo, --5 Pfacts_f_qprice.operand, --6 Pfacts_f_qprice.saison, --7 Pfacts_f_qprice.prog, --8 Pfacts_v_qprice.legacy, --9 Pfacts_v_qprice.tipo, --10 Pfacts_v_qprice.ab, --11 Pfacts_v_qprice.bis, --12 Pfacts_v_qprice.preis, --13 Pfacts_v_qprice.prsbtr, --14 Pfacts_v_qprice.waers, --15 Pfacts_v_qprice.tarifart, --16 Pfacts_v_qprice.kondigr, --17 Pfacts_v_qprice.prog --18 from Pfacts_key,Pfacts_f_qprice,Pfacts_v_qprice where Pfacts_key.legacy = Pfacts_f_qprice.legacy and Pfacts_v_qprice.legacy=Pfacts_key.legacy and Pfacts_f_qprice.legacy=Pfacts_v_qprice.legacy and Pfacts_f_qprice.prog=Pfacts_v_qprice.prog order by Pfacts_f_qprice.prog
